title: Are you the kind of person who tries to fill the emptiness of existence or just deny it? - Quora

response.answer_text: I just leave it empty and continue on. But if I had to pick, depends on how it manifested. How does existential emptiness manifest in such a way that it can be filled? Denying it reminds me of the time I kept forgetting about it. If emptiness is a space, I suppose I've come to fill the space with nice narratives.. Sometimes involving train rides and nice scenery.
